original_text: O that there were such an heart in them, that they would fear me, and keep all my commandments always, that it might be well with them, and with their children for ever!
korean_text: 다만 그들이 항상 이같은 마음을 품어 나를 경외하며 내 모든 명령을 지켜서 그들과 그 자손이 영원히 복 받기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: O that there were such an heart in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 그런 마음이 있다면 좋을 걸

sentences.original_text: and keep all my commandments always
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 언제나 나의 모든 계명을 지키기를

sentences.original_text: that it might be well with them
and with their children for ever!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 자손에게도 영원히 잘 되게 하려 함이라
